SYN_PT_4_2: EMERGENT BRONCHOSCOPY NOTE: The patient presented in acute respiratory failure. Immediate bronchoscopic inspection revealed a large mucus plug occluding the trachea, which was aspirated. Further inspection of the left mainstem stent revealed significant inspissated secretions causing partial obstruction. These were cleared via therapeutic aspiration, restoring stent patency. The patient's respiratory status improved immediately.
